title.native: ガールズバンドクライ

description:
Feeling out of place in the countryside, high school dropout Nina Iseri moves to Tokyo. After a rough first day and getting locked out of her apartment, she meets her favorite guitarist, Momoka Kawaragi. The two put on a street performance together and decide to start a band with three other girls. While each girl faces her own struggles, their passion for music keeps their dreams alive.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
hashtag: #ガールズバンドクライ #ガルクラ

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Full CGI
tags.description: Almost entirely created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Yuri
tags.description: Prominently features romance between two females, not inherently sexual. Also known as Girls' Love.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Found Family
tags.description: Features a group of characters with no biological relations that are united in a group providing social support.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Vocal Synth
tags.description: Features one or more singers or characters that are products of a synthesize singing program. Popular examples are Vocaloids, UTAUloids, and CeVIOs.

tags.name: Acting
tags.description: Centers around actors or the acting industry.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tanned Skin
tags.description: Prominently features characters with tanned skin.

tags.name: Orphan
tags.description: Prominently features a character that is an orphan.

node.description:
[Profile (agehasprings)](http://www.ageha.net/archives/ageha_creator/tamai_kenji)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tamaken0906)

Kenji Tamai is a Japanese producer, sound producer, vocal contractor, composer, arranger, lyricist and he is also the Representative Director of the sound production team agehasprings.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.
_Note: Not to be confused with Animator [Katsuhiro Takagi](https://anilist.co/staff/140213/Katsuhiro-Takagi)_.

__Birthplace:__ Hyougo Prefecture, Japan

__Yuusuke Tanaka__ is a Japanese music producer, composer and arranger affiliated with agehasprings.
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.
